name: Interactive components Demo - Wirecutter landing page
description:
Inspired by @Stammy's tweet - https://twitter.com/Stammy/status/1396885118258667520?s=20,


I made a fully interactive prototype using interactive components, variants, and autolayout.

  • Watchout for the trick that made the Newsletter component "disappear" 😉


Would love to connect? Happy to do so too. @iamfaithkenny on Twitter✨


Pending the time Figma rolls out the interactive component feature to everyone, only people in the beta group can play the prototype🙏
